# Ape Gnosis

Adds Gnosis Chain support to Ape CLI.

## Dependencies

* [python3](https://www.python.org/downloads) version 3.7 or greater, python3-dev

## Installation

### via `ape install`

```bash
ape install plugin gnosis
```

### via `ape-config.yaml`

```yaml
plugins:
  - name: gnosis
```

### via `pip`

```bash
cd ape-gnosis
python -m pip install . --user
```
